name: Jim The Spy
description:
Jim is a new recruit in a spy organization. His country is threatened to be invaded by an army of robots. He will be sent on several missions to protect his homeland.

The game features:

  • 10 different worlds
  • 3 difficulty settings and list of objectives for each world
  • a jazzy/espionage/retro atmosphere in a modern world
  • a lifetime of around 10 hours
